content.rendered:
24Fashion TV Exclusive: Jonathan Marc Stein Luxurious evening-wear was the star of the Jonathan Marc Stein show. From newsprint to classy evening styles, Jonathan brought it all.

The dresses ranged from cocktail variations to long and flowing, with glamorous shining highlights. It was a sight to behold! Jonathan took the runway next with a crowd pleasing collection of lux eveningwear in deep colors of emerald, ruby, and blue. Bold statement garments shined with elegant draping and tulle skirts.

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Liza Kushnir exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
